topic.title: i need help with privacy
topic.body: so, My Country is in risk of censorship in the internet, and im running out of time to have the max privacy possible, i already have tor/Zeronet. but, i need a password manager and vpn, anything that can help me with privacy. any tips? Softwares, Tips, Router config, anything.

1593724956_18FmpbxghV4UBgrjHpwgU1igoAt2g.body:
> [edgelordofdecent](#comment_602_1PGTHAmvu7K2PM7qqfoKyWv69aJsAaJQp5): That website should show you most of what should be good on a software level.

Thank u
